# -i/--index-url and --extra-index-url produce nearly equivalent behavior in dz
-i http://dist.pinaxproject.com/dev/
-e git+git://github.com/natea/feincms.git#egg=feincms
http://github.com/acdha/django-sugar/tarball/master#egg=django-sugar
--find-links=http://pypi.pinaxproject.com
--find-links=http://pypi2.pinaxproject.com
